G

GameClient - Class in RMIGameOfNim
GameClient class that communicates with the server via RMI
GameClient(GameClientJFrame) - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameClient
Default constructor used to connect the client to the server via the naming lookup tool, with the help of a String specified in @see RMIGameOfNim.GameEngineInterface
GameClientJFrame - Class in RMIGameOfNim
User interface for the Client
GameClientJFrame() - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameClientJFrame
Creates new form GameClientJFrame
GameEngineRemoteInterface - Interface in RMIGameOfNim
The remote interface used both by the server and clients Includes shared variables and methods that allow the client to execute commands on the server and receive update messages, for example used to tell the user the status of their operation or updates on the status of their current match
GameLogicEngine - Class in RMIGameOfNim
Core logic for the Game of Nim Keeps track of the total marbles for the game, the current count of marbles, a list of the comlpeted moves for debugging or error tracking
GameLogicEngine(int, GameServer, int, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
Use this constructor when creating a new GameLogicEngine (match) and assign the first player and choose the mode A second player must be assigned before one may start the game
GameLogicEngine(int, GameServer, int, int) - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
Deprecated.
Default constructor, defaulting to a value of 20 for GameLogicEngine.totalMarbles
GameLogicEngine(int, GameServer, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
Constructor specific to the requirements of the coursework: If hard is chosen a random integer between 2 and 100 will be chosen for GameLogicEngine.totalMarbles.
GameLogicEngine(int, GameServer, int, int, int) - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
Initialises the logic engine with a set amount of marbles Make sure you choose a positive integer above 2 or it will default to 20
GameServer - Class in RMIGameOfNim
GameServer which implements the remote interface GameEngineInterface It controls the main flow of the game and takes input from the players
GameServer() - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameServer
Deprecated. 
GameServer(GameServerJFrame) - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameServer
Use this constructor as it passes a reference to the JFrame, which is needed to update the server's GUI.
GameServerJFrame - Class in RMIGameOfNim
GameServerJFrame which displays the current state of the server with the help of a text window (log).
GameServerJFrame() - Constructor for class RMIGameOfNim.GameServerJFrame
Creates new form GameServerJFrame
getChosenDifficulty() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
 
getChosenDifficulty() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.Player
 
getChosenMode() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
 
getChosenMode() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.Player
 
getCompletedMoves() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
Getter for GameLogicEngine.completedMoves
getCurrentMarbles() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
Getter for GameLogicEngine.currentMarbles
getGei() - Static method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameClient
 
getInterface() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameClient
 
getMatchID() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
 
getMessages() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.Player
 
getPlayerID() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.Player
 
getPlayerNumber() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameClient
 
getPlayerOne() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
 
getPlayerTwo() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
 
getTotalMarbles() - Method in class RMIGameOfNim.GameLogicEngine
